SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Tui

Class Tui

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Tui.Tui
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class Tui extends Object implements View
The Tui class represents the Text User Interface of the game. It provides methods for running the game, setting the client, displaying game status, and handling user input.It communicates with the rest of the system by sending commands to the client. This class implements the View interface.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the game by displaying the title and starting the game interface. The game loop continuously reads user input and handles it based on the current game state.
      Specified by:
      run in interface View

    • showString

      public void showString(String phrase)
      Displays a generic message to the user. Plus, when the message is to notify the user that it's their turn to play, it prints the game status (e.g. manuscript, market, etc.).
      Specified by:
      showString in interface View
      Parameters:
